response.overview: Jury's Stellar Award Screendance: Thomas Edison Film Festival  Official Selection: Portland Dance Film Festival, Dance Camera West, ADF Movies by Movers, ASVOFF  Director/Producer/Choreographer: Kate Harpootlian  DP/Editor: Jonathas Nazareth  Producer: Purdie Baumann  Movement Collaborators and Dancers: Chantelle Good & Douglas Burkhardt  Punching Man: Michael Preen  Music: Tyler Belluz  Colorist: Kevin Ratigan for Nice Shoes  1st AC: Karoline Iversen  2nd AC: Alex Zaneti  Gaffer: Mario Riquelme  Key Grip: Eddie Lorenzo  Key Lighting: Emmet Luciano  Best Boy Grip: Blaine Davies  PAs: Leah Hofmann and Michael Preen  Location: Noah Aberlin & PJ Simmons  Camera Rental: Milk Digital
response.title: At First Sight
